body.p: This software package is the result of many hours of hard work. The persons involved as of this release are:

item.title: Per Cederberg <per at percederberg dot net>
Marielle Fois <marielle at kth dot se>

body.p: This software was initially created as a web solution for the Swedish Committee For Afghanistan. Much inspiration and many ideas behind this solution comes from, Erik Gustafsson (Information Coordinator at Swedish Committee), without whom this software would never have come into existence.
